Miltie--

Thanks many. That is very much what I am talking
about. Has a heavy size and heft to it, like a
blacksmith or iron worker might make, get fairly fine
finish and nicer iron.

Peter, thanks for the links.

I own the museum catalog that Rich T. brought back,
and it is a great little book with many examples we
don't see in other books. I had not looked through it
yet, and don't know if I would have found that.

Curran
